Author: snowh#3542
Content: if backup the android atomic dex seed, are all available coins kmd&co in the dex be recovered (after eg uninstall) ?

Author: snowh#3542
Content: if how come, how is it possible to recover all these chains from one seed? even erc20s

Author: gcharang#6833
Content: yes, just make sure you have a correct backup by restoring the seed before uninstalling

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
> if how come, how is it possible to recover all these chains from one seed? even erc20s
the seed words just provide randomness. using it, private key for any chain can be calculated
as it is a deterministic process, a seed word gives the same address for each chain every time

Author: snowh#3542

Author: snowh#3542
Content: latest version, who is putting the orders, who is MM?

Author: snowh#3542
Content: low liq at bad rates is killn user experience (still)

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
@snowh the app is still in beta and in development
low liq/bad rates are the expected state

anyone can place orders and anyone can be MM
if you don't find a pair with the price you want, simply create an order and leave the app in background
(you can see a "+" button with the text "Create an order" in the orders screen)

Author: snowh#3542
Content: ty, how long are placed orders valid?

Author: gcharang#6833
Content: if you are the maker, the orders will stay online as long as your app stays online or the order is filled
